scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && concurrently 'npm run assets' 'npm run html' 'npm run scripts' 'npm run styles' && find dist -type f -exec gzip -9 {} \; -exec mv {}.gz {} \;
scripts.deploy: concurrently 'npm t' 'npm run build' && aws s3 cp --recursive dist s3://elemental.audio --acl "public-read" --content-encoding "gzip"
scripts.scripts: browserify -t babelify src/index.js | sed 's/process.env.NODE_ENV/\x27production\x27/g' | sed 's/buckets\/elemental-reverb/http:\/\/elemental-reverb.s3-website-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/g' | sed 's/buckets\/elemental-samples/http:\/\/elemental-samples.s3-website-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/g' | uglifyjs -cm --screw-ie8 > dist/index.js
scripts.start: mkdir -p dist && concurrently 'npm run watch-assets' 'npm run watch-buckets' 'npm run watch-html' 'npm run watch-scripts' 'npm run watch-styles' 'npm run serve'
scripts.watch-assets: nodemon --watch src/assets -e ico,jpg,png,svg,wav --exec npm run assets
scripts.watch-buckets: nodemon --watch buckets -e ico,jpg,png,svg,wav --exec npm run buckets
scripts.watch-styles: node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist -x src && node-sass -w -r src -o dist --output-style compressed -x
